datoCmsProject.title: Awesome Employee Directory
datoCmsProject.description:
This is a mock company employee directory. AJAX is used to pull data from a random employee API.  Populates screen with tiles of employee info.  

Features:
- Returns 12 employee info tiles
- Search/filter returned employees 
- Each employee tile clickable into modal overlay
- Modal able to traverse next/back through employees

Assigned from Treehouse Tech Degree Program (www.teamtreehouse.com).
